thread.title: 18 Insignificant Things That Seriously Piss Everyone Off
thread.title_full: 18 Insignificant Things That Seriously Piss Everyone Off

author: Brian Galindo
title: 18 Insignificant Things That Seriously Piss Everyone Off
text:
View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @aglowswift Basically ruins your entire trip.
ID: 10445732 2. Or worse yet, when your favorite product has been discontinued all together. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
amazon.com Especially if it‚Äôs a beauty product that has CHANGED your life.
ID: 10445728 3. When the person whose HBO Go password you‚Äôve been using changes it. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @KristieKomperda And asking for the updated password can be tricky if you don‚Äôt really talk to them or their your EX.
ID: 10445739 4. When you don‚Äôt pay for extra iCloud storage and are forced to either NOT take a photo or delete older photos to make space. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @besdao starts internal conversation about whether to just buy the extra storage * ID: 10445745 5. When you only packed a carry-on bag because you didn‚Äôt want to check a bag in, but are forced to check-in your bag at the gate ‚Äòcause there is no overhead bin space. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @eTurboNews The. Worst.
ID: 10445760 6. When you‚Äôre excited to see Amazon has the product you want at a better price, but then realize it‚Äôs not on Prime. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Emoji/Amazon So with shipping it basically ends up being more expensive than just buying it at the store.
ID: 10452655 7. When you pay extra for a new upgraded WiFi router, but it‚Äôs still just as slow as your old one. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
amazon.com ‚ÄúThere goes my Netflix marathon.‚Äù
ID: 10446408 8. When you‚Äôre just a few bucks (or sometimes cents) away from free shipping, BUT can‚Äôt find one more thing you want. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @addisonsherman Makes you reconsider even ordering anything, TBH.
ID: 10446419 9. When your DVR cuts off the ending of your favorite TV show because it ran a few minutes over. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @BobSorey Having the show end on a cliffhanger is aggravating enough.
ID: 10446432 10. When you see your iPhone is at 12%, but it suddenly dies. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
digitaltrends.com What hell?! Did you just give up on life, Mr. iPhone?!
ID: 10446442 11. When you plan to sleep in, but end up waking up early anyways and can‚Äôt go back to sleep. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Nickelodeon OK, how come this doesn‚Äôt happen when I have to go to work?!
ID: 10446446 12. When you go hungry to party where the host said there will be food, but all there is to eat is like one bag of chips. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Masci91 / Getty Images Don‚Äôt say ‚Äúcome hungry‚Äù and then not feed me!
ID: 10446449 13. When there are no spots in the parking lot and you see that some jerk took up two of them. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @ellis0811 ‚ÄúYeah, sure‚Ä¶I want to spend another 20 minutes circling around for a spot.‚Äù
ID: 10446455 14. When you‚Äôre checking out at the store and move lines to what looks like a quicker line only to have the line you were just in move faster. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @MMinevich Why üèº does üèº this üèº always üèº happen? üèº
ID: 10446457 15. When the person in the express lane has way more items then they‚Äôre supposed to have. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @BillyBlac It says 15 items or less, NOT 25 items or less! And yes, I counted!
ID: 10446688 16. When you make a reservation in advance for a table, but still end up waiting a long while when you show up to the restaurant. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @CPlagmann 
ID: 10446465 17. When you click on a YouTube video and the commercial playing before it is longer than the actual video you want to watch. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Robert Sullivan / AFP / Getty Images ‚ÄúWell, I just wasted a minute and half watching an ad for a 45 second video.‚Äù
ID: 10446589 18. And finally, when you don‚Äôt check your Facebook for a few hours and then see that you were tagged by a friend in a super unflattering photo. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
instagram.com ‚ÄúOh, I see you facetuned your face to the point where you look like cartoon character, but you couldn‚Äôt even throw a filter on me!‚Äù
ID: 10446523 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
